CustomField.description:
When this setting is enabled, the Plan Details tab is not included in account plans of this type, and plan details can’t be included in a Powerpoint export of one of these plans.
When this setting is disabled, the Plan Details tab is included in account plans of this type, and plan details can be included in a Powerpoint export as long as the AM Add Plan Details setting is enabled in Dealmaker Powerpoint custom settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, the Plan Details tab is not in these plans, and plan details can’t be in a Powerpoint export. When disabled, the tab is included, and plan details can be exported if AM Add Plan Details is enabled in Powerpoint custom settings.
CustomField.label: Disable Plan Details
